title: KFCradio: Jon Taffer
description:
Jon Taffer stops by to answer voicemails about eating in a nightclub, writing a cover letter to date a girl and how not to be full of shit. KFC and Feits also answer voicemails about the worst thing your mother can say to you about sex, a girl using her ex-boyfriend'sÂ didlo, and one night in Bangkok.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
